item.description:
"Come on down!" and check out Ernie Boch Jr. (Owner of Boch Toyota on the Auto Mile) with his band Ernie and the Automatics.
This will be their CD release party of "Low Expectations" so it should be a great time.
Ticket price is $22 for the 8pm show and $15 for the 10pm show OR BOTH SHOWS for $25!
I will be planning on staying for both shows (why not).

PLEASE NOTE: UPDATE...

If you rsvp'd yes and didn't buy your tickets yet please call chan's asap and pre order your tickets, then send me an e-mail to let me know you got your ticket.
Chan's told me on Friday that the show was almost sold out and I'd like to have an idea of how many are going to be able to go.
When you order your ticket(s) tell them you're with Mark's meet up group so they'll know how many seats to researve together.

This will be a joint event with The Worcester County Active Singles Meet Up Group so if you're a member of both PLEASE don't rsvp with both groups.
As Always (with my events anyways) There is NO MAYBE rsvp choice but there will be a waiting list if it fills up.
item.name: Rockin Blues with Ernie and the Automatics
